website_summaries.verdict: This set is an impressive choice for a single child or a duo since it comes with 2 dolls, each with its own accessories.
pros: Big dolls feature many details to match almost exactly the movie characters
Each doll has its own accessories and animal sidekick
Dolls are lightweight and comfortable for little hands to hold
Recommended for kids aged 3 years old and up
cons: While Moana has life-like hair, Maui’s is plastic

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: These dolls are BIG! They are bigger than I thought. Pictured with a regular size barbie. Great buy!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great set! Great price!
customer_reviews.text: This set was absolutely perfect for my 5 year old boy/girl twins who are obsessed with this movie. I really like how both characters have their own accessory and animal sidekick (great if you're splitting up between siblings!) Maui is HUGE and his tattoos look very cool! Moana's hair and dress are quite nice, as well. The price I paid for this set was amazing...I got a Cyber Monday deal for $25. Kohls is selling this same set for $75!! What?! Overall, great product. Tons of hours of imaginative play to be had here!
customer_reviews.author: sing_sweet_man

customer_reviews.title: Great Set of Moana Favorites!
customer_reviews.text: My two year old daughter absolutely loves Moana, but she also likes Maui, so this is a great set with some of her favorites. The Moana doll is beautiful and looks to be of good quality, and Maui is really huge as stated in some other reviews. Like, he completely dwarfs her, but he's really huge in the movie, so I don't know why we'd expect something different with his proportions as a doll. It would look weird if he was the same size as Moana. Anyway, I think they're well-made and I can't wait to see her play with them!
customer_reviews.author: NiftyNest

customer_reviews.title: I would buy this again!
customer_reviews.text: I bought is after seeing the movie and they're so great. I thought they would have been smaller for the cost but they're huge! I love that! I love playing dolls with my kids so when I saw this I kinda bought it for myself but I let them think it's theres. What a great movie.
customer_reviews.author: shawnie rector

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Set!
customer_reviews.text: This set was a present for my 3 year old's birthday. It was packaged nicely and the set all seems to be very good quality. Maui is really cool looking. He is pretty big and nicely heavy. Even his hook is made well and not easily bent. Pua and Hei Hei are also very cute and a great addition to the set. Moana is also well made. She has nice curly hair and is very cute. My daughter is very happy with this gift!
customer_reviews.author: Shawn & Kristen Newton

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids!
customer_reviews.text: A toy is an item that is used in play, especially one designed for such use. Playing with toys can be an enjoyable means of training young children for life in society. Different materials like wood, clay, paper, and plastic are used to make toys. Many items are designed to serve as toys, but goods produced for other purposes can also be used. For instance, a small child may fold an ordinary piece of paper into an airplane shape and "fly it". Newer forms of toys include interactive digital entertainment. Some toys are produced primarily as collectors' items and are intended for display only.
customer_reviews.author: gus oropeza

customer_reviews.title: but I don't understand why Maui has hard plastic hair while Moana has regular hair like the barbies
customer_reviews.text: This set is cut, but I don't understand why Maui has hard plastic hair while Moana has regular hair like the barbies. If you watch behind the scenes video, you'll see how the movie company's research found that Maui's hair was very important to the Demi God, so why make the hair fake? Anyway, my kid loves this set and it is very cute. Any little Moana Princess or lover will really enjoy this set.
customer_reviews.author: JBP

customer_reviews.title: Maui is HUGE. She is the size of a ...
customer_reviews.text: Maui is HUGE. She is the size of a smaller barbie, but he is enormous... as a demigod should be.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Clark

customer_reviews.title: Moana Fan Granddaughter Loves this Set
customer_reviews.text: Our 1.5 year-old granddaughter loves this set because she thinks she is Moana and she has memorized several pieces of dialog from the movie. She drags Moana all over the place with her and Moana survives the ocean (in our water table) again and again. Maui is rather large but she drags him all over the house, too. She loves looking at Maui's detailed tattoos. And, let's not forget Pua and Hei Hei, whom she kisses many times every day. Great value for the money - especially for a massive Moana fan. I also appreciated that the manufacturer tried to be provide the most sustainable packaging possible, such as raffia ties (versus metal) and cardboard (versus plastic).
customer_reviews.author: kenneth perlmutter

customer_reviews.title: Awesome toys!
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a Christmas gift for my 2 year old and she loves it! Especially Maui lol We saw the movies when it was in theatres and feel immediately in love. We have been listening to the soundtrack everyday. The toys are well made and alot bigger than I was expecting. Maui is HUGE and kind of heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Ana

customer_reviews.title: Great for the Moana fans and allot larger than expected.
customer_reviews.text: Gift for niece who absolutely loved it. Much larger than anticipated almost a foot tall and great quality. Would highly recommend to the Maona fan or little one who likes to play with this sort of toys. Great price only wish it had some type of voice or played one of the musical tunes from the movie. That would have put it over the top.
customer_reviews.author: Christiaan Jansen

customer_reviews.title: Scorreeeee!!
customer_reviews.text: This is such a great deal... when my toddler had Moana on her letter to Santa, my search began for the perfect Moana doll. Most were riddled with issues ranging from weird looking dolls to extremely undersized dolls and dolls with weird texture of hair. When I found this, couldnt believe that I was getting so many more characters besides a regular Barbie sized Moana!! Can’t wait to see the look on my daughter’s face come Christmas morning!
customer_reviews.author: Ozee

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly great quality
customer_reviews.text: We bought this set for our children for Christmas. They absolutely love it. It's great for acting out the various scenes from the movie, plus what ever pops into their heads as they play. I adore this set and this movie, because it allows my son and daughter to play together. Happy kids=happy mom.
customer_reviews.author: Jinju

customer_reviews.title: So cool!
customer_reviews.text: My son went nuts when I gave him these. They're awesome. Especially Maui. He's huge! I really didn't expect him to be so big. Moana is about the size of a typical doll, but Maui is about the size of my 10 year old sister's head. Plus he's heavy, very sturdy. The others are sturdy, too, which is a great bonus when my son has a habit of breaking or chewing on his toys a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Kerry Greenough

customer_reviews.title: Wow, these so cool!
customer_reviews.text: This set seemed a little pricey...but after receiving them, totally worth it! They're beautiful, well made and bigger than expected. Maui is huge. The details are true to the movie and not cheap looking at all. Grand daughter is going to lose her mind, Moana is her favorite.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Insane Value!!
customer_reviews.text: We got this as a Christmas gift for my daughter and although she hasn't tested it for durability yet because it's wrapped and sitting under our Christmas tree, I cannot believe what an incredible value this is, the quality looks fantastic! We saw the same item for twice the price at Target!! The dolls look incredible and this gift will surely make our daughter very happy!! Fantastic product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality. Add more Moana to your life.
customer_reviews.text: Moana has taken over our life. We can sing the songs in our sleep. We speak HeiHei the chicken. So, of course, we needed all the characters. That way we can have MORE Moana in our life. They are great quality. I definitely recommend them!
customer_reviews.author: W&M Bishop

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Set!
customer_reviews.text: This set is AWESOME! I'm so glad I snagged it on a Lightening Deal for my kids! The characters are HUGE, the price was great, and they love it! As a parent, I like that they don't make any sounds or light up, as it encourages the kids to use their imaginations and I don't have to keep replacing batteries. We love this!
customer_reviews.author: jobody

customer_reviews.title: You won’t be disappointed in the quality.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these dollars as Christmas gifts for a friends daughter on Cyber Monday. I was expecting not so great quality and very small items for the price of 14.99. Well when I received the package my wife and I were shocked with how big the figures were and the box was in pristine condition. Definitely grabbed a great value seeing how this usually retails for around $50 or so. I’m sure our friends daughter will love it seeing as she is a huge Moanna fan.
customer_reviews.author: J. Dimone

customer_reviews.title: Way better than expected
customer_reviews.text: Way better than expected! Great details, well-made, durable, and bigger in size than I expected. Has all the important characters and pieces from the movie - Moana, Maui, magic fish hook, paddle, necklace, etc. My granddaughter's favorite character is Maui. She gets all the characters out and plays with them while watching the movie. Great for imaginative play and for fans of the movie.
customer_reviews.author: CMW

customer_reviews.title: Not AS well made as other disney dolls used to be but
customer_reviews.text: My son loved it! I loved it! Maui is massive! Moana has loose doll hair! Hey hey looks the way he did before they changed his roll in tge film! The kid reenacts scenes from the movie, it's just been a lovely Christmas. Moana's doll's legs make a chea- toy rattling sound, thats my only gripe, but I'm confident that she'll hold up through a few years of play time
customer_reviews.author: Window shopper

customer_reviews.title: Great items for a fair price
customer_reviews.text: Great items for a fair price! Moana is similar to a standard-sized Barbie, and the Maui doll is bigger than I expected. My 5-year-old daugther and even 2-year-old son love playing with these figures, especially after having just seen the movie. So glad I purchased this!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love the whole set !!!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome set !all the characters are real well made , real large Maue what is super cool so he looks like actual movie come alive except his hair is plastic , but I suppose it would be hard to keep it in place if it wasn’t :) Thank you for the reasonable price ! Highly recommended !!
customer_reviews.author: Irena G.

customer_reviews.title: which was a happy surprise. The details are really well done and ...
customer_reviews.text: These were much bigger than I expected for the price, which was a happy surprise. The details are really well done and overall these are very high quality. My daughter loves playing out scenes from the movie with them. :)
customer_reviews.author: delightfulxcrab

customer_reviews.title: My Daughter Loves These
customer_reviews.text: My 2-year old is really enjoying these toys. Maui is very heavy, though, so she has to be careful not to drop him on her feet. Also, he's not good in the bathtub... a lot of water gets inside and doesn't come out for days! But still a nice set.
customer_reviews.author: Leanne83

customer_reviews.title: Fun set
customer_reviews.text: Others have commented that Maui's huge and they were not kidding. I think he's almost as wide as Moana is tall. It's a fun set though and my 5-year old daughter loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Mommy of Many

customer_reviews.title: Bigger than expected.
customer_reviews.text: Larger than expected. Great quality and detail. Maui is a little big for my 3 year old to carry around. He wishes Maui could be manipulated a little more but he is pretty much a big stiff piece of plastic. Moana is about average Barbie doll size.
customer_reviews.author: amy t

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend. I purchased them for my 2 year old ...
customer_reviews.text: I was impressed with the size and quality. I highly recommend. I purchased them for my 2 year old son because he is just obsessed with Moana!
customer_reviews.author: Moonflower

customer_reviews.title: Can't think of anything negative to say about this set!
customer_reviews.text: Dolls are large, quality is good. My daughter has played with these off and on for months now. Moana's hair is crazy by now, but what "Barbie's" hair doesn't go crazy after even a week of play, lol.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie HRH

customer_reviews.title: This set it all you need!
customer_reviews.text: Our daughter is obsessed with Moana and this play set sent her over the moon. The figures are large and great for make-believe play. Only thing I would change is to make Maui's hair "real" like Moana's. Instead, it is hard plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline McCready

customer_reviews.title: They are ok, but not very poseable
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my daughter. She loves them and plays with them often. I docked one star because the figures are not very poseable. The arms and legs don't have a lot of joints.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Paul

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: My niece LOVES this play set. It comes with all of these characters and they are decent sized, they aren't mini toys. She loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Florence Robertson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value
customer_reviews.text: This was a great value for all that came in this kit. Maui is well made and Moana has real doll hair. The little characters are all good size. Super proud of this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Dirttrack Dorie

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: Love Maui! It is well made and sturdy. Moana is beautiful too. But after receiving I realized I bought the wrong product. So returning it. I thought he said some phrases.
customer_reviews.author: Melinda M Hurley

customer_reviews.title: Great action figures, hair was the only issue.
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing quality and my kid adores them. This is his favorite movie and he carries them around all day long. I'm not sure why Maui's hair is hard plastic, but we did have to put Moana's hair up in a bun to save her from the toddler.
customer_reviews.author: JesseB

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: These dolls are so much larger than I expected! They are about the same size as a barbie doll, maybe a tad smaller. Quality is great and the packaging came in good shape. My niece is going to love this
customer_reviews.author: Brooke Boyd

customer_reviews.title: Fun Gift for Moana lovers
customer_reviews.text: Great gift for Moana lovers. I was surprised how large the figure of Maui was... My niece was so happy to have received this Christmas gift
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: ... expected and the quality of Moana was not as good as if you were to buy her alone
customer_reviews.text: Maui was a lot larger then I expected and the quality of Moana was not as good as if you were to buy her alone . Yet still a great product !
customer_reviews.author: moriyama

customer_reviews.title: Great price!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a Christmas present when a toy store was asking $60 at an OUTLET MALL This is a great toy with very good quality at a great price!!
customer_reviews.author: Linda L Bierle

customer_reviews.title: This is an amazing set! The figures are HUGE
customer_reviews.text: Wow! This is an amazing set! The figures are HUGE! They are as large as Barbie dolls. What a great gift this will make for my niece.
customer_reviews.author: A. Epps

customer_reviews.title: The dolls seem strong and of good quality. Maui is a lot bigger than I ...
customer_reviews.text: It arrive very fast. The dolls seem strong and of good quality. Maui is a lot bigger than I expected. My niece is going to love it.
customer_reviews.author: Rivermed

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: my grand daughter loves loves loves these toys - won't go anywhere without them
customer_reviews.author: Mary Edgar-Braning

customer_reviews.title: Great set
customer_reviews.text: This was a great set for my niece's birthday gift. She really liked the set and played with it next to the pool as the ocean. Its came with a lot of toys for a great value!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa W

customer_reviews.title: My kid loves these toys.
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my 3 yr old who loves the movie and she has played with them everyday since she received them. They are well made and she really enjoys the accessories and animal friends.
customer_reviews.author: Dvsdyn

customer_reviews.title: A big hit!
customer_reviews.text: My teenage god daughter is a big Disney fan. I took her to see Moana and we both loved it! I gave this to her for her birthday and she adores it. Our only issue is they made the characters too dark and with harsh looking facial expressions. It does not represent real oceana/polynesians.
customer_reviews.author: Teri

customer_reviews.title: Super big ,easy for the little ones to play with
customer_reviews.text: Very NICE set of toys, I bought two sets and my granddaughters were ecstatic , They are a very nice size easy for little hands to hold
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Busutil

customer_reviews.title: awesome gift choice
customer_reviews.text: My 2 boys are Moana fanatics and this was an awesome present. Very durable (even the oar) and Maui is just huge. Moana's outfit still is intact months later (even the necklace)
customer_reviews.author: Julie-Marie Lebbie

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Our daughter loves Moana. Everything about Moana. So needless to say this was a huge hit.
customer_reviews.author: jayb

customer_reviews.title: Great set and very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This set is very sturdy. My kids are extremely rough with their toys and everything in this set has survived them (minus the oar being bent a bit). Moana is a regular sized doll (like a Barbie) but Maui is huge!!! My kids love this set. I would definitely recommend to other Moana fans.
customer_reviews.author: Mamaroo

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: We got such a good deal on this set. It’s a great size & so cute with all the little extras.
customer_reviews.author: Vaultdwellerjill

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Much larger than I expected. Amazing quality. Overall very pleased and would order again.
customer_reviews.author: Kg11

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Super cool set. Way bigger than I expected. I can't wait until my daughter opens it on Christmas! ♡
customer_reviews.author: Joi D.

customer_reviews.title: HUGE FOR YOUR MONEY
customer_reviews.text: OMG!!!!! These are HUGEEEE I got this for sale for $16 and I can’t believe how awesome and big these are!!!
customer_reviews.author: BobbyIvory

customer_reviews.title: Cute, though really quite big
customer_reviews.text: Much bigger than we expected. Otherwise, looks like the pic. Have a hard time getting Moana to balance upright.
customer_reviews.author: DDG

customer_reviews.title: This one is definately every bit as big as it ...
customer_reviews.text: This one is definately every bit as big as it says, the big guy, wore, he's big and I cringe everytime she drops it.
customer_reviews.author: Marjorie Parfrey

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift
customer_reviews.text: Dolls were purchased as a gift for my 2 yr old granddaughter and she absolutely loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Rico

customer_reviews.title: Daughters love Moana!
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality for the price. Full sized (Barbie-ish) dolls, although Maui is much bigger than I expected (in a good way). My daughters love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: But it!
customer_reviews.text: The toys appear to be great quality and they are much larger than they appear online. My son is going to flip over them. He loves Moana, thanks for the great product and great deal!
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my child that loves the movie! More sturdy than I expected, toys these days seem so thin and fragile, but these are great!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah H

customer_reviews.title: Barbie sized Moana
customer_reviews.text: These figures are larger than I expected. Moana is Barbie sized to give reference. My kids love them and they seem sturdy so far!
customer_reviews.author: CarmenMilo

customer_reviews.title: Great set
customer_reviews.text: These are great! If you're looking at these and the other set, buy these. They are very detailed and most importantly, very durable!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My kids absolutely LOVED this set
customer_reviews.text: My kids absolutely LOVED this set!!! Very cute, very well made. A pain taking out of the packaging, but what isn't that doesn't have the frustration free packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Dandylion

customer_reviews.title: What a great deal! I read reviews that the size of ...
customer_reviews.text: What a great deal! I read reviews that the size of Moana was comparable to other dolls and that was correct. Maui is bigger and a bit heavy but my kids love him and make it work. His hair is plastic but Moana has curly real hair. For the price I got it I was beyond impressed!
customer_reviews.author: M. Romano

customer_reviews.title: Maui is great, Moana not so much
customer_reviews.text: Maui is great, Moana not so much. Hard to get the oar to stay in her hands, she doesn't stand up so well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dolls bigger than I expected!
customer_reviews.text: These are a little bigger than your average Barbie, but it makes them all the cooler!
customer_reviews.author: Marci Rinehart

customer_reviews.title: Holy Maui!
customer_reviews.text: These were much larger than I anticipated, but we like them. The accessories are a nice touch.
customer_reviews.author: Nhahn

customer_reviews.title: Made niece happy
customer_reviews.text: Got these as a gift for my niece and she reportedly loved them. The price was not bad either so I'm glad I bought them!
customer_reviews.author: Norma

customer_reviews.title: Love them all
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these toys! We loved the movie. He was excited when they arrived. The Maui doll is a little hard and has some pointy edges.
customer_reviews.author: dosiere

customer_reviews.title: Loved, but a little too big.
customer_reviews.text: I really loved the doll; however, they were a bit larger than expected. We would have kept them for our daughter to play with, but she received 4 Moana dolls for her birthday. I just couldn't stand to have another in the house! lol.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So cute!!
customer_reviews.text: These are so cute! Awesome size and great price for this set. Was the perfect Christmas gift for my son who loves Moana!!
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the $
customer_reviews.text: Great value for the price, I was surprised how big they were.
customer_reviews.author: DR

customer_reviews.title: My only complaint is the hula skirt is very hard to hook back together and comes off easily. Has lots of good details and very c
customer_reviews.text: Bought this mostly for Maui. This is about 12in tall and very heavy and well made. My only complaint is the hula skirt is very hard to hook back together and comes off easily. Has lots of good details and very clear sound.
customer_reviews.author: Manny23

customer_reviews.title: Buy!
customer_reviews.text: Like other reviews mentioned, these are HUGE. However, well built and worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: B Harwood

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and big in size
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and big in size. My 5 yr old daughter loved it! I gave it to her as one of her Christmas' present.

customer_reviews.title: Moana
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved it. But the guys skirt would not stay on
customer_reviews.author: sco

customer_reviews.title: I would buy this again
customer_reviews.text: I brought it as a gift. She Lived it so much she slept with him the night she got it:)
customer_reviews.author: Barb

customer_reviews.title: Package arrived in rough shape
customer_reviews.text: Box the items came was pretty beat up but the figures looked to be in good shape. Just hate that the box looks so rough for it is a birthday gift for our niece. So bc of how the package arrived I give it 3 stars. However, toys themself seem to be in good condition.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great bargain
customer_reviews.text: Great deal. Both dolls are pretty big and the quality is good. Their arms moves. I would recommend.

customer_reviews.title: So cute
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my two year old granddaughter and she loves the dolls.

customer_reviews.text: This is a gift for my granddaughter. I’m pleased with the product and she will get lots of enjoyment from it.

customer_reviews.text: These toys were actually bigger than expected and a great Christmas gift for my granddaughter.

customer_reviews.title: Purchased for a Moana fan for her upcoming 5th birthday ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for a Moana fan for her upcoming 5th birthday. She's gonna be ecstatic. The dolls are much bigger than I expected. But of course Maui is a big guy! Definitely worth the price at the time I purchased.

customer_reviews.title: Great for a Moana lover

customer_reviews.title: Great Moana dolls ,nice size !

customer_reviews.title: Quality!!

customer_reviews.title: I love these!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my daughter for Christmas, and she is going to love them. These are really great quality, and they were a steal! I can honestly say for the first time, they are bigger than I expected...usually I get things that are the opposite. Would definitely buy again

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for Moana lover
customer_reviews.text: Perfect birthday gift for my toddler. She is obsessed with watching Moana. She loves these dolls.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This is a favorite in my family and would buy it again.

product_meta.title: Disney Moana Adventure Collection
product_meta.description: Moana of Oceania's friends join her on an action-packed voyage on the open ocean in Disney's Moana. This adventure pack features the spirited teenager, Moana of Oceania, Maui the demigod, Hei Hei, an overly confident rooster, and Pua, a puppy-like pig. Kids can reenact their favorite story moments and create their own with these figures. Set includes a removable outfit and necklace, a fishhook accessory, and an oar accessory. Copyright Disney Hasbro and all related terms are trademarks of Hasbro.
feature_bullets: Moana of Oceania friends together in one pack
Kids can reenact their favorite movie moments
Includes doll, outfit, 3 figures, and 3 accessories
